name: backend-wizard-3
description: 1. Clone repo 2. `npm install` 3. Create `.env` with DB credentials 4. Start MySQL 5. Ensure database `country_currency_api` exists 6. Create `refresh_log` table with id=1: ```sql CREATE TABLE refresh_log (   id INT PRIMARY KEY,   last_refreshed_at DATETIME ); INSERT INTO refresh_log (id, last_refreshed_at) VALUES (1, NOW());
